description:
10:12 PM PST We are investigating increased delays for CloudWatch metrics in the SA-EAST-1 Region. CloudWatch alarms may transition into "INSUFFICIENT_DATA" state if set on delayed metrics.
10:32 PM PST We can confirm delays in some CloudWatch metrics in the SA-EAST-1 Region. We are actively working to resolve the issue.
11:16 PM PST We are still investigating delays with CloudWatch metrics in the SA-EAST-1 Region and are actively working to resolve the issue.
Nov 5, 2:08 AM PST We are still seeing recovery in the CloudWatch metric delays in the SA-EAST-1 region. We are continuing to work to fully resolve the issue.
Nov 5, 2:20 AM PST Between 9:30 PM PST and 2:10 AM PST in the SA-EAST-1 Region, customers experienced increased delays in some metrics. During that time, alarms on delayed metrics may have transitioned into an INSUFFICIENT_DATA state. We have resolved the issue. Delayed metrics are in the process of backfilling in CloudWatch console graphs and for API retrieval. The CloudWatch service is operating normally.
